about_the_game:
Features of the current DEMO

  • Local Multiplayer: Battle against your friends on the same couch

  • Vs CPU: Train your skills in a single-player experience vs the CPU

  • 2 Playable Characters: Zer0 and Slice

  • 3 Stages: Ziggurat, Data Center, and Training Room.

  • 8 Terrains

Street Fighter meets Nidhogg in the best game to introduce fighting games to your friends that don't play fighting games. Cross the goal to win the match, use the platforms to position yourself strategically, react quickly, KO your opponent, and run as fast as you can. Rollback Netcode.

Platforms add a new dimension to strategic positioning. Read, react and trick your opponent

Position yourself strategically to get the advantage. Knock out your opponent by breaking their guard with your combos, punish them at the right moment or trick them using throws, pokes, and cross-ups.

Make combos and special attacks without bleeding your thumb

Characters are controlled only with directions and two attack buttons, making the game very easy to learn.

Training execution for days before playing online is not needed for this game. Go straight to the fun playing the mind game of fighting games.

Cross the goal and win the match!

Defeat your opponent, run fast as possible and cross the goal at the end of the stage to win the match.

Learn fighting game concepts by playing

Don't know what cross-counter, priority, or cross-up hits are? Don't worry! The game will show you them as they happen, and you'll learn by playing.

Rollback netcode ensures a responsive low latency gameplay experience.

Planned Features (Pending Funding)

  • History Mode: An amazing single-player experience

  • Local Multiplayer: Battle against your friends on the same couch

  • 10 Playable Characters across 3 Unique Factions

  • 7 Stages designed for intense battles

  • 40+ Terrains offering diverse strategic gameplay

  • Rollback Netcode Multiplayer for smooth, cross-platform online play.

Stay tuned for updates as we bring this vision to life!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core Duo 2.6GHz or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.13 or superior
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Resistance 204X

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core Duo 2.6GHz or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Definitely feels like I'm experiencing the whole world of fighting games in one match... Big AAA fighting games could definitely learn from this indie game here.”
NihongoGamer

“This is one of the most promising indie fighting games to come on the near horizon.”
Destructoid

“Everything is done in such a stylish and appealing way... it's kind of addictive.”
IGN Japan
short_description: Street Fighter meets Nidhogg in the best game to introduce fighting games to your friends that don't play fighting games. Cross the goal to win the match, use the platforms to position yourself strategically, react quickly, KO your opponent, and run as fast as you can. Rollback Netcode.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America
